sec1.subtitle: Analysis of any developing business can  for sure reveal a platform in its heart. A platform is not just a mere IT-solution — it is an ideology for expanding business.

development.title: IT-platform development
development.creatingPlatform: Creating a platform instead of a monolithic system.

automation.title: Business automation
automation.integration: Integration of external services with your systems.
automation.decomposition: Decomposition of monolithic systems into flexible micro-service based system.

outsourcing.title: Development outsourcing
outsourcing.tAndM: T&M. Our software development consultants are assigned to your team on an hourly basis.
outsourcing.team: Our own Agile team to handle dedicated project blocks.

sec3.title: Platforms instead of monolithic IT-systems improve your business flexibility
sec3.paragraph_1_1: Classic systems set back business development.
sec3.paragraph_2: The platforms we design consist of a set of micro-services with each one fulfilling its own purpose: for example, files storage, transactions processing or document signing service.

pitfails.title: Pitfalls of monolithic systems
pitfails.atomicity: Atomicity. Changing the system is a monumental challenge
pitfails.lowPerformance: Low performance. Systems store up a lot of garbage
pitfails.costs: Costs. Expensive licenses and maintenance fees
pitfails.lackNovelty: Lack of novelty. Entire system upgrade needed

advantages.title: Microservices advantage
advantages.modularity: Modularity. Systems are assembled as design kits
advantages.easyIntegration: Easy integration. Standard all purpose interface
advantages.costAndSpeed: Cost and speed. Open Source technologies
advantages.upgrades: Upgrades and availability. Easy assembling and modules replacement

sec4.title: Development outsourcing
sec4.subTitle_1: Our whole team or an individual IT Solution Architect can be assigned to your project.
sec4.subTitle_2: There are two kinds of approach to solving the task:

timeAndMaterial.title: Time and material
timeAndMaterial.text: It’s the best solution if your corporate in-house IT-team needs provisional reinforcement to pass through the peak of the project. This approach serves for creating mock-up solutions in case you have several ideas of your future project.

projectApproach.title: Project approach
projectApproach.text: This approach works for fit-for-purpose solutions. First we create the project structure, interface engineering, data models, business processes, internal and external communication services system and then start development.

sec6.title: About us
sec6.paragraph_1: We are a professional team, specializing in fintech market solutions. We have accomplished dozens of platform solutions based on Opensource technologies, like Java, Python, Go, Ruby on Rails, ReactJS, GraphQL, PostreSQL, Cloudera, Camunda, etc..
sec6.paragraph_2: We will readily create smartly elaborated solutions together with development flow patterned after best CI/CD, DevOps practices. You will able to evolve the product using your own resources.

ceo.name: Yevgeny Agafonov
ceo.about: 10 years of IT-companies management experience. Dozens of implemented projects and teams created.

cio.name: Mikhail Sarytchev
cio.about: 18 years experience in IT. Development leader and active member of Opensource Russia.

sec7.title: In the core of our project list

businessEnvironment.title: Business environment
businessEnvironment.text: On-line education system – courses, video lessons, tests, questionnaires, webinars, communities, news and blogs.

sberkredo.title: Sberkredo
sberkredo.text: Investment platform enabling small and microbusiness companies to get financing from individuals and institutional investors.

cpa.title: CPA Partnership program
cpa.text: Banking product implementation through partnership network. The platform is the aggregator of hundred sales companies, banking services throughout Russia.

legalCycle.title: Legal Cycle
legalCycle.text: Blockchain platform against counterfeit. Product authenticity protected by Java Card microchip and blockchain network smart-contract.

pgk.title: Mobile reporter Freight One
pgk.text: Set of services and application for carriage condition assessment by customer’s acceptance. The system aggregates carriage location data and seeks replacement for out-of-order carriages in real-time mode. Predicting carriage in-service time based on mobile application data.

ls.title: LevSciences
ls.text: Biotech platform for life Sciences. The place where selected researches can get support from each other. Show the research progress, exchange equipment and chemical reagents, give access to lab areas.

dbi.text: We highly estimate that you, guys, have accomplished your job as qualified professionals and that your response to the problems revealed was perfect!On the whole it was great to work together and I am convinced we'll have more to do in the nearest future!
dbi.name: Mikhail Serebryanikov

technologiiKreditovaniya.text: At every stage Pfactory have gained a reputation of a highly prefessional, competent and ambitious partner. Our tentative relations that started six months ago, have turned into regular partnership that will thrive. Your qulified and professional developers team, combined with a ready UI library enabled us to significantly accelerate the development stage. Based on our own experience, I woud not hesitate to recommend your company to others who search for professional development through outsourcing.
technologiiKreditovaniya.name: Artur Gadziev

rostelecom.text: When we formulated the idea of a new software program,  Pfactory team proved to be absolutely fantastic in requirement capture and technical solutions, in fact they  created a prototype to check their approach. It was a strong basis for developing the end-product and a perfect start of future cooperation.
rostelecom.name: Nikolay Tarin

businessEnvironment.text: Pfactory have helped us to create a world class education platform.  A team of advanced professionals skilled to meet all our needs in platforms development. There's not a single task that is big or small for them; they are reliable and time-sensitive.
businessEnvironment.name: Aleksander Volchenkov

sberbank.text: Pfactory offers effective project management that has a significant impact on time and money.  New releases are supplied in due time and they entirely correspond with your requirements. We are absolutely happy with their job well done and recommend them as partners for applications development.
sberbank.name: Vitaly Mikhailov

ylab.text: A while ago a dedicated unit of our company became an autonomous and strong player.  We granted the guys a good start but they gave us back much more: implementation of turn-key platform projects on Java  and happy customers.  We wish you a long market life and further cooperation.
ylab.name: Pavel Frolov

sec9.title: Contacts
sec9.subtitle: Call us or leave your request order. We'll contact you within one hour.
